formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A VALUE ERROR in GenInit[24] occurs with the following message.

listitem.screen: GenInit[24] _←{ ⍝ Handle each global expr in turn

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: When doing the initialization generation, there might not be any expressions to initialize, in which case the main iteration over each of these values will not work correctly, and an empty value will be the return result, leading to this error. Checking to ensure that we have data instead of a fill argument test will help this.
